footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the origins, benefits, and sacred process of the Ayahuasca ceremony.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guardians who will accompany you on your journey of transformation.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a profound experience. Access our complete guide.
contactCommunityText: Join our community and stay updated on our upcoming events and ceremonies. Follow us on our social networks.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two sacred plants. It is used in traditional ceremonies to facilitate deep processes of healing, self-knowledge, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces a modified state of consciousness that allows for the exploration of the subconscious, releasing emotional blockages, and gaining a clearer and more expanded understanding of oneself and the universe.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant because it teaches, guides, and reveals profound knowledge. Each experience is unique and is adapted to the personal process of each participant, offering what is necessary for their evolution.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Provides a clear and profound perspective on your life, purpose, and decisions.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Helps release deep traumas, emotional blockages, and psychosomatic ailments.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Expands consciousness and strengthens the connection with nature, the universe, and your own essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the collective energy enhances healing. Ideal for feeling accompanied and supported by the community.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized journey focused on your specific process, with the dedicated attention of the guides.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team dedicated to your well-being, committed to accompanying you with respect, love, and professionalism on your path of healing and self-discovery.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual teacher trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned directly from healers the sacred use of ancestral medicine. With a serene and profound presence, she guides ceremonies in Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where it accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her professional presence guarantees a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Medicine guardian trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, containment and balance between the physical and spiritual, holding the ceremonial space with firmness, care and deep connection with feminine healing.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your transformation.
registerSuccessDescription: We have sent a verification link to your email.
errorMinLength: The {{field}} must be at least {{count}} characters.
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'Yes'.
errorPositiveNumber: The {{field}} must be a positive number.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: Your journey of transformation begins long before the ceremony. Proper preparation is the key to opening yourself to the deepest teachings of the medicine and navigating the experience with clarity and confidence. This guide will accompany you step by step.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please specify the medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolarity, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or explore...
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other sacred plants?
preparationCompleteDescription: You have completed all the preparation steps. You are now ready to embark on this journey of healing and self-discovery. We are waiting for you at the ceremony.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: This is a summary of the information you provided.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted any answers yet.
preparationProcessDescription: Understand the stages of your journey, from preparation to integration.
ceremonyProcessDescription: What to expect during the sacred ritual and how to navigate the experience.
experienceProcessDescription: Visions, emotions, and purges as part of the healing.
integrationProcessDescription: How to apply the teachings in your daily life for lasting transformation.
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, it is crucial to prepare your body by avoiding certain foods to purify your system and allow the medicine to work more effectively.
allowedFoodsList: Fresh fruits and vegetables, legumes, whole grains (rice, quinoa), lean chicken or fish (grilled or steamed), drink plenty of water.
prohibitedFoodsList: Red meat, pork, spicy or fried foods, fermented products, aged cheeses, alcohol, coffee, and recreational drugs.
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your inner state is as important as your physical diet. Cultivate a calm and receptive mind.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly define what you want to work on. What do you want to heal? What do you want to understand?
reflectionDescription: Journal about your thoughts and emotions. This will help you clarify your intentions.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be emotionally intense. Come with an open heart, ready to face and release what no longer serves you. Trust the process and the guides.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure a comfortable and focused experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, warm clothing (in layers), a blanket or sleeping bag, a pillow or cushion, a change of clothes.
essentialsList: A bottle of water, a flashlight (with red light if possible), a notebook and pen for jotting down reflections, personal hygiene items.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
authRequiredJourneyDescription: Please sign in or create an account to continue your journey and access our exclusive content.
authRequiredCeremoniesDescription: Please sign in to view the details of our upcoming ceremonies and reserve your spot.
authRequiredPreparationDescription: Access the complete guide to prepare your body and mind for a transformative experience.
authRequiredQuestionnaireDescription: Complete your medical questionnaire to ensure a safe and profound experience.

newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue with your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: https://artedesanar.vercel.app/questionnaire

rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data from before the last import? This will overwrite any changes made since.
